sequence.utilities
Class SVGFactory

java.lang.Object
  sequence.utilities.SVGFactory

public class SVGFactory
extends java.lang.Object

A factory for creating SVG graphics from View. Only ActivityView are convert to SVG.

See Also:
View, ActivityView
